title: RL33727
content: H.R. 4772 aims to provide property owners with access to federal courts for certain constitutional claims. It allows for federal jurisdiction even if state remedies have not been pursued and sets guidelines for when federal courts can abstain from deciding on real property issues. Additionally, it ensures that takings actions under specific statutes are ripe for adjudication after a final decision by the government.
